creator: seva_popov@tvworks.com
text:
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/manual.html

Now:
security  A-sec  false A-sec No appender accumulation since the additivity 
flag is set to false. 
security.access  none  true  A-sec  Only appenders of "security" because the 
additivity flag in "security" is set to false. 

Should be:
security  A1, A-sec  false A-sec Appenders of "security" and root. No appender 
accumulation since the additivity flag is set to false. 
security.access  none  true  A-sec  Only appenders of "security" because the 
additivity flag in "security" is set to false.
